original_text:
And I will restore your judges as at the first,
    and your counselors as at the beginning.
Afterward you shall be called the city of righteousness,
    the faithful city.”
korean_text: 내가 네 재판관들을 처음과 같이, 네 모사들을 본래와 같이 회복할 것이라 그리한 후에야 네가 의의 성읍이라, 신실한 고을이라 불리리라 하셨나니

sentences.original_text: And I will restore your judges as at the first,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희 재판관들을 처음과 같이 회복시키겠고,

sentences.original_text: and your counselors as at the beginning.
Afterward you shall be called the city of righteousness,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 너는 의의 도시라 불리우리라.
